short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide video lengths, progress bar, and comments for select channels on YouTube.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Toggle the progress bar and comments back on to review plays or partake in discussions.

Enjoy watching your favorite sports- and esports channels on YouTube spoiler free.

Don't forget to turn of video previews in your YouTube playback settings.

If the extension stops working correctly it's likely due to YouTube receiving an update. I'll try to get it up to date as soon as possible. But due to the review process it will take a couple of days to update at minimum.

Version 1.1: Updated compatibility with YouTube.
Version 1.2: Added settings. Added thumbnail progress obscuration. Updated compatibility with YouTube.
